pages.text: Scientologists come from all walks of life. They are concerned about social problems and support numerous social betterment programs, which provide effective drug-abuse rehabilitation, improve educational standards and help reduce crime and moral decay.

NEWS CATEGORIES Grand Openings Scientology Events Religious Freedom Scientology TV How We Help News SHARE RECENT NEWS JUNE 28, 2025 Rhodesia Reborn: Zimbabwe Estate Receives a Hero’s Welcome as New L. Ron Hubbard Landmark Site MAY 31, 2025 Phoenix Rising: Grand Opening of Historic Landmark Where Dianetics & Scientology United ALL NEWS LOCATE YOUR NEAREST SCIENTOLOGY ORGANIZATION VIEW LIST Layout with featured Clearwater, Florida From Eruption to Expansion: Dianetics Is Diamond for Its 75th Anniversary Celebration Seventy-five years ago, a book ignited a global movement. Tonight, that fire blazed anew—revealing all new facets of Dianetics , the bestselling book ever on the human mind. May 10, 2025 CLEARWATER, FLORIDA • MARCH 15, 2025 L. Ron Hubbard Birthday Celebration 2025: Honoring the Past, Fulfilling the Future Thousands of Scientologists from around the world gather at the spiritual headquarters in Clearwater to honor the birthday of Founder L. Ron Hubbard, celebrating a vision that transcends generations. More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2024 365 Days of Expansion: Scientology Celebrates a Year of Explosive Growth, Ringing in an Unstoppable 2025 Thousands fill the Shrine Auditorium to celebrate a year defined by extraordinary milestones and record-shattering achievements, paving the way to a golden future for Scientology. More EAST GRINSTEAD, ENGLAND • OCTOBER 27, 2024 IAS Celebrates 40 Years of Triumph as a Global Force for Freedom Members of the International Association of Scientologists (IAS) gathered from six continents to commemorate a monumental anniversary and reignite an enduring commitment to humanity. More CLEARWATER, FLORIDA • MARCH 16, 2024 Thinking Big—Church of Scientology Celebrates Founder’s Birthday with Exponential Expansion Thousands of Scientologists from Florida and around the globe gather at the religion’s spiritual headquarters in Clearwater to mark Founder L. Ron Hubbard’s birthday—complete with the legendary Birthday Game—and to festively celebrate both his vision and his Technology. More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2023 New Year’s Scientology-Style: Celebrating an Expansive Past, Ringing in a Boundless Future With the Shrine Auditorium packed to capacity, Scientologists closed the book on an unprecedented year, launching into a future of limitless horizons in 2024! More EAST GRINSTEAD, ENGLAND • NOVEMBER 3, 2023 Monumental IAS Celebration Marks Unforgettable Era of Global Humanitarian Impact Members of the International Association of Scientologists (IAS) representing 90 nations gathered in East Grinstead, Southern England, for a weekend-long celebration honoring four historic years of dedication, determination and accomplishment. More CLEARWATER, FLORIDA • MARCH 18, 2023 Epic Expansion—Epic Celebration: A Weekend Honoring Founder L. Ron Hubbard’s Birthday Thousands from across the world of Scientology arrived at the religion’s international spiritual headquarters in Clearwater, Florida, for an unprecedented celebration of Founder L. Ron Hubbard’s birthday. More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2019 End of a Decade, Beginning of Forever: New Year’s Celebration Caps History-Defining Ten Years for Scientology Thousands congregate in Los Angeles to celebrate the culmination of the greatest period of growth in Scientology history. More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2019 A Decade of Accomplishments More HACK: FIX ME Los Angeles, California A Monumental Decade in Review December 31, 2019
Los Angeles, California
A Monumental Decade in Review
December 31, 2019
LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2019 New Scientology Organizations Dedicated from 2010-2020 More EAST GRINSTEAD, ENGLAND • OCTOBER 13, 2019 Heroic Humanitarianism: IAS 35th Anniversary Celebrates the Profound Progress of a Global Movement The International Association of Scientologists (IAS) gathers in East Grinstead, Southern England, to mark a year of unparalleled achievement in the name of uplifting Mankind. More THE CARIBBEAN • JUNE 24, 2019 Infinite Possibility: The Freewinds 31st Maiden Voyage Anniversary Celebrates Exceptional Year of Global Advancement A gathering of parishioners at the highest levels of Scientology representing their congregations around the world, convenes for an annual voyage applauding a spectacular year of Church expansion. More CLEARWATER, FLORIDA • MARCH 12, 2019 A Birthday Celebration for the Ages: Scientologists from 70 Nations Gather to Honor Founder L. Ron Hubbard The joyous weekend of festivities draws thousands for a time-traveling, globe-hopping tribute to the extraordinary life and legacy of L. Ron Hubbard at Scientology’s spiritual capital in Clearwater, Florida. More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2018 Church of Scientology Celebrates Greatest Year in History and the Dawn of a Most Promising 2019 365 days of accomplishment come full circle with a celebration honoring expansion and social advance to uplift and inspire today’s world. More EAST GRINSTEAD, ENGLAND • OCTOBER 7, 2018 Astonishing Accomplishments: Humanitarian Success Celebrated for Magnificent IAS Weekend The 34th annual celebration of the International Association of Scientologists (IAS) fits a year of historic heights into three days of delight in Southern England. More HACK: FIX ME The Caribbean The Freewinds 30th Anniversary Maiden Voyage Celebration Jubilantly Honors 365 Days of Monumental Scientology Achievement June 25, 2018
The Caribbean
The Freewinds 30th Anniversary Maiden Voyage Celebration Jubilantly Honors 365 Days of Monumental Scientology Achievement
Scientologists from around the globe embark on the Motor Vessel Freewinds, a Church of Scientology religious retreat, to plan further-reaching expansion and celebrate what was 12 months of unbroken success.
June 25, 2018
CLEARWATER, FLORIDA • MARCH 10, 2018 Thousands Converge to Mark Scientology Founder’s Birthday and a “Flip of the Switch” for Unrelenting Dissemination L. Ron Hubbard’s life and legacy honored at spiritual headquarters in Clearwater, Florida, capped by game-changing unveiling of the Scientology Network for religion’s worldwide growth. More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • NEW YEAR’S 2018 Time for Celebration: Scientology Honors Year of Record Growth and Welcomes a 2018 Full of Potential Thousands joyously ring in the New Year and reflect on a run of unbridled achievements in the name of a better world. More EAST GRINSTEAD, UNITED KINGDOM • OCTOBER 8, 2017 IAS Gala Weekend Fêtes Year of Humanitarian Help and Advance The International Association of Scientologists (IAS), an ever-expanding force for good within the worldwide humanitarian community, gathered in East Grinstead, Southern England, on the first weekend in October to recognize a year of expansion and accomplishment. More THE CARIBBEAN • JUNE 20, 2017 Unlimited Horizons: The Freewinds Maiden Voyage Anniversary Recaps Transcendent 12 Months for Scientology The world’s most dedicated Scientologists cast off for a week-long cruise to celebrate successes and set the agenda for an expansive year across the seven seas. More CLEARWATER, FLORIDA • MARCH 13, 2017 Inspirational Birthday Celebration Fêtes Past, Present and Future Legacy of L. Ron Hubbard Clearwater, Florida becomes nexus point for Church celebration to honor the transcendent life of Scientology Founder. More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2016 Bringing Peace and Building Civilization: Church of Scientology Farewells a 2016 of Boundless Growth and Achievement New Year’s celebration marks surge of new Churches and showcases twelve months of accomplishment across every facet of the religion. More HACK: FIX ME East Grinstead, United Kingdom Grand Weekend of Celebration Highlights Monumental Year of IAS Accomplishment October 7, 2016
East Grinstead, United Kingdom
Grand Weekend of Celebration Highlights Monumental Year of IAS Accomplishment
Expansion and accomplishment were in the spotlight during a weekend of festivities and fanfare that heralded 12 months of worldwide impact in the name of the International Association of Scientologists (IAS).
October 7, 2016
THE CARIBBEAN • JUNE 20, 2016 Freewinds Maiden Voyage Anniversary Honors Unforgettable 12 Months for Scientology Advanced Scientologists board Freewinds for June week of planning in the name of Church expansion and celebrating an amazing year of triumphs. More CLEARWATER, FLORIDA • MARCH 13, 2016 A Magical Birthday Gala Illuminates the Legacy of Founder L. Ron Hubbard Thousands converge on Scientology Spiritual Capital in Clearwater, Florida, for a dazzling weekend of celebration in honor of the religion’s Founder—L. Ron Hubbard (LRH). More LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA • DECEMBER 31, 2015 Scientology Welcomes 2016 Following Year of Unprecedented Expansion and Advance Thousands commemorate twelve months of inspiring achievements in a gala New Year’s celebration at the legendary Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles, with 2015 marking a period of historic growth for the religion. More EAST GRINSTEAD, UNITED KINGDOM • OCTOBER 23, 2015 International Association of Scientologists Marks Year of Incomparable Global Impact IAS 31 st Anniversary Celebration at Saint Hill, UK, shines an incandescent light on Scientology’s historic expansion and unprecedented reach, climaxing 12 months of extraordinary worldwide achievement. The Church’s six global humanitarian initiatives come together in a single Florida location to benefit all citizens, giving a much-needed local home to Church-sponsored international programs at the intersection of help and hope.

Scientologists come from all walks of life. They are concerned about social problems and support numerous social betterment programs, which provide effective drug-abuse rehabilitation, improve educational standards and help reduce crime and moral decay.

Church of Scientology is dedicated to eradicating drug abuse through education - The Truth About Drugs campaign for a drug-free world.

Take the most accurate and reliable personality test »
Oxford Capacity Analysis (OCA) Test
What is the OCA?
How it Works
Personal Successes
Most of our lives we've been taught to believe that personality is a genetic trait that cannot be changed, and that you just have to "deal with it." This simply is not true. The fact is, you can change your personality and become a much better, happier version of yourself that faces and conquers the challenges of life with knowledge and ease—the real you.
Find your problem areas and discover your level of happiness, self-confidence, stability and more.
Find out how your personality determines your ability to handle relationships.
Know your strengths and learn how to increase them so that you can achieve more out of life and reach higher states of existence.
Fill out the form to the right to begin your free Personality Test now »
The OCA Personality Test and complimentary results consultation are absolutely free with no obligation—it’s simply a great opportunity to learn more about you.
Privacy Info
Your information will only be used for the purpose of administering this personality test and evaluation. You also have the option of receiving more information on Scientology. Your information will never be sold or otherwise given to a third party. If at any time you wish to no longer receive email from us, simply use the link provided at the bottom of the message. Feel free to review our
Privacy Policy
for further details.
